member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies flags returned in the ValidationFlags field of the structure passed into a call to when the feature specified is . The returned flags indicate the features that are not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_CODEC_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The specified codec is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_INPUT_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The specified input format is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The specified codec configuration is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_RATE_CONTROL_MODE_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The specified rate control mode is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_RATE_CONTROL_CONFIGURATION_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The specified rate control configuration is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_INTRA_REFRESH_MODE_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The specified intra refresh mode is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_SUBREGION_LAYOUT_MODE_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The specified subregion layout mode is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_RESOLUTION_NOT_SUPPORTED_IN_LIST
member.summary: The specified resolution is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_VALIDATION_FLAG_GOP_STRUCTURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
